text: Wolfen is a 1981 American crime horror movie directed by Michael Wadleigh and based on the 1978 novel by Whitley Strieber. It stars Albert Finney, Diane Venora, Gregory Hines, Edward James Olmos, Tom Waits, Tom Noonan and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1981 crime movies Category:1981 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Wolfen (movie)
